directions: Heat a pan over medium-high heat.
Add olive oil, salsa, garlic and saut√© for a few minutes or until fragrant.
Turn to medium heat and let simmer for about 10-15 minutes, turning occasionally to avoid sticking to the bottom. Can add a little water if desired.
Serve over white rice or by itself! =)

title: Authentic Puerto Rican Beans
